snippet: Euro zone monthly retail sales fell in January for the third consecutive month, against market expectations of a rise, estimates released by Eurostat on Friday showed, in a sign of lower consumer appetite for spending as prices go up....

headline.main: US Admiral in Disputed South China Sea: 'We Will Be Here'
headline.print_headline: US Admiral in Disputed South China Sea: 'We Will Be Here'

lead_paragraph: Euro zone monthly retail sales fell in January for the third consecutive month, against market expectations of a rise, estimates released by Eurostat on Friday showed, in a sign of lower consumer appetite for spending as prices go up.
